ABOUT THE PLACE
Crown Heights, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: President St (2, 5), Nostrand Av (2, 3, 4, 5), Botanic Garden (FS). Massive gut renovated 1 bedroom apartment with lots of natural light!!! This modern kitchen features stone countertops with stainless steel appliances includeing a dishwasher and microwave!! Incredible amenities included, such as Laundry in in unit, hardwood floors, exposed brick and Central AC. Located near Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Franklin Ave, and just one short block to the 2,5 trains - quick ride into Manhattan! This Wont Last! Call today for a showing

ABOUT THE PLACE
Crown Heights, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Franklin Av (2, 3, 4, 5), Park Pl (FS). Beautiful apartment in the heart of Crown Heights. The unit features exposed brick, hardwood floors, renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large renovated bathroom, bedroom with a large closet and much more. Steps from the Franklin Avenue 4/5 train line and the S train line which connects to the C train. Conveniently located near Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Garden, Prospect Park, Grand Army Plaza, restaurants, bars, cafes, shops, Citi Bikes and much more. Must See! We can help you find roommates.

ABOUT THE PLACE
Crown Heights, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Franklin Av (2, 3, 4, 5), Botanic Garden (FS). Beautiful apartment in a pre-war elevator building. The unit features stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, hardwood floors, exposed brick, large windows, large living room, and much more. Steps away from the S/2/3/4/5 train line, trendy Franklin Avenue shops, restaurants, coffee shops and bars. Just a few blocks from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Garden, Grand Army Plaza library, Prospect Park YMCA and much more. Must See!
